document_data.mainbody:
Omar al-Farid was a holy slayer and member of the Grey Fire in 1367 DR.
Omar was more a follower than a leader, trusting in his sisters judgement in most matters.
Omar was a chubby man who had a round face. He wore dark clothing to match his hair and eyes.
Omars parents were killed when he was still a child, forcing him and his sister Fadiya to fend for themselves on the streets of Hiyal until they were welcomed by the Everlasting.
